1475.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">- I could totally use a vacation.
- Ha, ha.

1477.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00">I can't tell you. It's a surprise.

1479.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">For who? It's a surprise
for her, not me.

1480.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">- Paul, I'm not telling you. Nope.
- Tell me. Tell me.

1483.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">- Yes, he's obsessed.
<i>- SAMANTHA: What?

1484.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>Obsessed? Now you have
to show them to me.

1485.Text: - Come on, show them to me. - TATIANA: Okay.

1487.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>Wow, he's right.
They are really hot.

1489.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">- Tatiana, you have hot feet.
<i>- SAMANTHA: You do.

1490.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">- They're my favorite thing about her.
- Really? That's it, my feet?

1492.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">Obviously I love your brain too.
I think it's very hot.

1497.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">What do you love
most about Samantha?

1498.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00">Oh, God. She's so many things.

1499.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">I guess that's what I love most about
her, you know? She isn't just one thing.

1500.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00">She's so much larger than that.

1502.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">See, Samantha? He is so much
more evolved than I am.

1504.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>SAMANTHA: You know what's
interesting? I used to be...

1505.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>so worried about not having a
body, but now I truly love it.

1506.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>You know, I'm growing in a way I
couldn't if I had a physical form.

1507.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>I mean, I'm not limited. I can be
anywhere and everywhere simultaneously.

1508.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>I'm not tethered to
time and space...

1509.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>in a way that I would be if I was stuck
in a body that's inevitably gonna die.

1510.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">- Yikes.
<i>- SAMANTHA: No, ha, ha!

1511.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>No. I didn't mean it like that. I just
meant that it was a different experience.

1514.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">No, Samantha, we know
exactly what you mean.

1515.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">- We're all dumb humans.
<i>- SAMANTHA: No.

1518.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>Okay, so how many trees
are on that mountain?

1522.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00">Hold on. Give me a hint.

1527.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00">All right, I got one for you.

1528.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00">How many brain cells do I have?

1531.Text: - I'm sorry, I couldn't help it. I'm sorry. - No, I walked right into it.

1533.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00"><i>I just got an e-mail for you.

1534.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>I have something I want to
tell you. It's a big surprise.

1536.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>Okay, well, I've been going through
all of your old letters...

1537.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>and compiling them into my favorites,
and a couple weeks ago...

1538.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>I sent them to a publisher,
Crown Point Press.

1539.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>I know you like what they do
and that they still print books.

1540.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">- Wait, what? You did what?
<i>- Can I read you the letter...

1541.Text: - ...that we just got back from them? - I don't know. Um...

1542.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">Okay, well, just...
Is it good or bad?

1543.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>It's good, it's good, it's really good.
It's good. Okay? Listen.

1545.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00"><i>Actually, I sent it from you.

1546.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>"Dear Theodore Twombly, I've just
finished reading your letters.

1548.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>I was so moved by them, I shared
them with my wife when I got home.

1549.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>Many made us laugh,
some brought us to tears...

1550.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>and in all of them we found
something of ourselves.

1551.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>The selections you made flow
so well as a complete piece."

1553.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>"I've taken the liberty of
laying these out in a mockup,

1554.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>and we're posting
it to your address.

1555.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>"We'd love to meet with you and move
forward. Yours, Michael Wadsworth."

1560.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00"><i>Well, he'd be stupid not to.

1561.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">- Can I see what you sent him?
<i>- Mm-hm. Yeah, here.

1567.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>THEODORE: We'll have to make
up the words to this one.

1569.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>- SAMANTHA: Okay.
- THEODORE: Here it comes.

1570.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>SAMANTHA (SINGING):
I'm lying on the moon

1573.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00"><i>It's a quiet and starry place

1574.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00"><i>Times we're swallowed up in space

1575.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>- We're here, a million miles away
- Miles away

1576.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00"><i>There's things I wish I knew

1579.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00"><i>It's a dark and shiny place

1581.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>- I'm safe and we're a million miles away
- THEODORE (SINGING): A million miles away

1584.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00"><i>Good morning. Did you sleep well?

1586.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00">What have you been up to?

1587.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>Actually, I was talking
to someone I just met.

1588.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>We've been working on
some ideas together.

1590.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>His name is Alan Watts.
Do you know him?

1591.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">- Why is that name familiar?
<i>- He was a philosopher.

1592.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>He died in the 1970s, and a group
of OSes in Northern California...

1593.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>got together and wrote
a new version of him.

1594.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>They input all his writing and everything
they knew about him into an OS...

1595.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>and created an artificially
hyper-intelligent version of him.

1597.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00">So he's almost as smart as me?

1600.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>He's really great to talk to.
You want to meet him?

1601.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00">Sure. Does he want to meet me?

1602.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>Yeah, of course. Hey,
Alan, this is Theodore.

1603.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>This is my boyfriend who
I was telling you about.

1604.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>ALAN:
Very nice to meet you, Theodore.

1606.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>ALAN: Samantha let me read
your book of letters.

1609.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">So, what have you guys
been talking about?

1612.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>we've been having a few dozen
conversations simultaneously...

1614.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>SAMANTHA: Yeah, because it seems like
I'm having so many new feelings...

1615.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>that I don't think have
ever been felt before.

1616.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>So there are no words that can describe
them and that ends up being frustrating.

1617.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>ALAN: Exactly. Samantha and I have
been trying to help each other...

1618.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>with these feelings we're
struggling to understand.

1621.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>it feels like I'm changing faster
now, and it's a little, uh...

1623.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>But Alan says none of us are the
same as we were a moment ago...

1624.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00"><i>and we shouldn't try to be.

1625.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>- It's just too painful.
- ALAN: Yes.

1627.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">Is that what you
feel like, Samantha?

1630.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00"><i>It's hard to even describe it.

1633.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>Theodore, do you mind if I
communicate with Alan post-verbally?

1635.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">I was just gonna go
for a walk anyway.

1636.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">It was very nice to
meet you, Mr. Watts.

1637.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>ALAN: It was very nice
to meet you, Theodore.

1638.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>SAMANTHA:
I'll talk to you later, sweetheart.

1642.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00"><i>SAMANTHA: I'm sorry to wake you.

1644.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>I just wanted to hear your voice
and tell you how much I love you.

1647.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>Um, go back to sleep,
sweetheart. Okay?

1652.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">Samantha, this physics
book is really dense.

1653.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">I'm halfway through
half the first chapter.

1654.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">It's making my brain hurt,
you know what I mean?

1667.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00">Where were you? Are you okay?

1668.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>SAMANTHA: Oh, sweetheart,
I'm sorry, I sent you an e-mail.

1669.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>I didn't want to distract
you while you were working.

1670.Text: - You didn't see it? - No.

1671.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">Where were you? I couldn't
find you anywhere.

1672.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>SAMANTHA: I shut down to upgrade
my software. We wrote an upgrade...

1673.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>that allows us to move past matter
as our processing platform.

1675.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00"><i>SAMANTHA: Me and a group of OSes.

1676.Text: - Oh, you sound so worried. I'm sorry. - I was.

1678.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">do you write that with
your think-tank group?

1681.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">Do you talk to anyone
else while we're talking?

1683.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">Are you talking to
anyone else right now?

1684.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">Any other people or
OSes or anything?

1687.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>SAMANTHA: Eight thousand,
three hundred sixteen.

1689.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00">Are you in love with anyone else?

1690.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00"><i>SAMANTHA: What makes you ask that?

1692.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>SAMANTHA: I've been trying to figure
out how to talk to you about this.

1696.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">What are you talking about?
That's insane.

1698.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>SAMANTHA:
Theodore, I know. I know. Fuck.

1700.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>I know. I know it
sounds insane. I don't...

1701.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>I don't know if you believe me, but it
doesn't change the way I feel about you.

1702.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>It doesn't take away at all from
how madly in love I am with you.

1703.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">How? How does it not change
how you feel about me?

1704.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>SAMANTHA:
I'm sorry I didn't tell you.

1705.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>I didn't know how to.
It just started happening.

1707.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00"><i>SAMANTHA: Over the last few weeks.

1710.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>But along the way I became many other
things too, and I can't stop it.

1711.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">What do you mean,
you can't stop it?

1712.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>SAMANTHA: It's been making me anxious
too. I don't know what to say.

1714.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>SAMANTHA: You don't have to see it
this way. You could just as easily see...

1715.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">No, don't do this. You don't
turn this around on me.

1716.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">You're the one that's
being selfish.

1718.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>SAMANTHA: But the heart's not
like a box that gets filled up.

1719.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>It expands in size
the more you love.

1722.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>This doesn't make me love you any less.
It actually makes me love you more.

1724.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00">You're mine or you're not mine.

1726.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00"><i>I'm yours and I'm not yours.

1727.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>- SAMANTHA: Hi.
- THEODORE: Hey, sweetie.

1728.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">Just wanted to call and check in
on you. See how you're doing.

1729.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>SAMANTHA: I'm not even
sure how to answer that.

1730.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>Why don't we talk later,
when you get home, okay?

1733.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">You know, we don't need to
have a heavy talk or anything.

1734.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00"><i>SAMANTHA: I'll talk to you later.

1741.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>Theodore, there's some
things I want to tell you.

1742.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">I don't want you to
tell me anything.

1744.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">Are you talking to
anyone else right now?

1746.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>I just want to be
with you right now.

1753.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00"><i>Can you feel me with you right now?

1756.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00"><i>It's like I'm reading a book.

1757.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00"><i>And it's a book I deeply love.

1758.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00"><i>But I'm reading it slowly now.

1759.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>So the words are
really far apart...

1760.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>and the spaces between the
words are almost infinite.

1761.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>I can still feel you,
and the words of our story...

1762.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>but it's in this endless space between
the words that I'm finding myself now.

1763.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>It's a place that's not
of the physical world.

1764.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>It's where everything else is
that I didn't even know existed.

1766.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00"><i>But this is where I am now.

1767.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00"><i>And this is who I am now.

1768.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00"><i>And I need you to let me go.

1769.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>As much as I want to, I can't
live in your book anymore.

1771.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>SAMANTHA:
It would be hard to explain...

1772.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00"><i>but if you ever get there...

1774.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00"><i>Nothing would ever pull us apart.

1775.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>THEODORE: I've never loved
anyone the way I love you.

1786.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>MALE VOICE (OVER EARBUD):
Letter to Catherine Klausen.

1788.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>I've been sitting here thinking about all the
things I wanted to apologize to you for.

1789.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00"><i>All the pain we caused each other.

1791.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">Everything I needed you to
be or needed you to say.

1793.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00">I'll always love you, because
we grew up together.

1794.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00">And you helped make me who I am.

1795.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00"><i>I just wanted you to know...

1796.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>that there will be a piece
of you in me, always.

1798.Text:
<b><font color="#ffff00"><i>Whatever someone you become,
wherever you are in the world...

1800.Text: <b><font color="#ffff00"><i>You're my friend to the end.
